name: Don't Trust The Devs (Betruvio)
description:
Battle your way through the dungeon and eliminate the corruption! Buy new guns, upgrade your Transport and delete the Virus!

Music, Pixel Art, SFX, Videos, Audio and coding were all made by me under 72 hours for the #1 BenBonk's Game Jam. It is a Pixel Art Roguelike with randomly generated maps and VHS ambience. I hope you like it!

PS: When you kill the third boss nothing happens, couldn't get the win sign to work in  time :(

You can visit my Youtube Channel, I will be uploading a Devlog Series very soon!

Betruvio.

Controls:

Move: WASD (Or not...)

Shoot: Left Mouse Button
